item.title: #TIL : Eloquent Many-to-Many Relationship
item.description: Eloquent Many-to-Many Relationship To create the n-to-m relationship in Eloquent, we create a table stand between 2 tables. Eg: We have the db schema : post post_tag tag id (PK) id (PK) id (PK) title post_id (Index) name (Unique) content tag_id (Index) In the model Post and Tag, we define a relation : App\Model\Post.
